overview: The Hybrid Azure Local Architecture integrates on-premises resources with Azure services, providing a robust hybrid cloud model that supports both traditional and containerized applications. It leverages Azure management tools and security measures to ensure seamless operation and security.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Manages resources and services through Azure portal, Azure CLI, and templates.
security_considerations: Access control policies must be enforced to limit access to the control plane.
Regular audits of access logs to detect unauthorized access attempts.
components.data_handling: Manages metadata and configurations for resources.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest and in transit is encrypted.

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Hosts traditional VMs and Kubernetes-based applications, utilizing Azure Arc for management.
security_considerations: Ensure that Azure Arc is configured to enforce security policies.
Use network segmentation to isolate workloads.
components.data_handling: Processes application data and user interactions.
components.authorization_model: RBAC and Kubernetes Role-Based Access Control
components.encryption_status: Data at rest is encrypted using Azure Disk Encryption.

components.name: Hyper-V
components.description: Virtualization platform for running virtual machines.
security_considerations: Regularly update Hyper-V to mitigate vulnerabilities.
Implement secure boot and shielded VMs.
components.data_handling: Handles virtual machine data and configurations.

components.name: Azure Virtual Desktop
components.description: Provides session hosts for remote desktop services.
security_considerations: Implement multi-factor authentication for user access.
Use conditional access policies to restrict access based on risk.
components.data_handling: Handles user sessions and application data.
components.encryption_status: All data in transit is encrypted.

components.name: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
components.description: Manages containerized applications enabled by Azure Arc.
security_considerations: Implement network policies to control traffic between pods.
Regularly scan container images for vulnerabilities.
components.data_handling: Processes application data in containerized environments.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest is encrypted using Azure Storage encryption.

components.name: Validated Hardware
components.description: Specifies hardware requirements and configurations for Azure Local.
security_considerations: Ensure hardware is sourced from trusted vendors.
Regularly update firmware to mitigate vulnerabilities.

components.name: Switch/Router/Firewall
components.description: Facilitates East/West traffic management between local machines and external connections.
security_considerations: Implement access control lists to restrict traffic.
Regularly update firewall rules based on threat intelligence.
components.data_handling: Manages network traffic and data packets.
components.encryption_status: Traffic can be encrypted using VPNs.

trust_boundaries.name: Local Network Boundary
recommendations: Implement strict access controls on local network devices.
Regularly review and update network configurations.

trust_boundaries.name: Cloud Boundary
recommendations: Conduct regular security assessments of cloud configurations.
Utilize Azure Policy to enforce compliance.
